remarks.para: May be inoperative provided another acceptable means to verify APU condition is available and used.

numlitem.para: Position APU VALVE switch to OFF. Check to see that APU VALVE light does not illuminate.
Turn APU selector switch to OFF.
Wait 20 seconds, observe APU FAULT light momentarily illuminates to indicate APU fuel valve is intransit to closed.
Monitor APU RPM and EGT on ElCAS, load APU when APU RPM is 95% or greater.

note.para: - 60 minute cooling period following third attempt.

placard.para: Placard RUN Light on APU Control Panel "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
